eu_initiatives: Directives and initiatives regarding the transport market especially railways are followed by Railistics. Technical Specifications for Interoperability (TSI) as well as reform initiatives of the railway sector and intermodal transport business. TEN-T initiatives and DG Regio developments are also of major importance.
membership:
Deutsches Verkehrsforum (https://www.verkehrsforum.de/) 
Studiengesellschaft Kombinierter Verkehr (http://www.sgkv.de/de/) 
Bundesvereinigung Logistik (http://www.bvl.de/)
relevant_communication: Railistics provides services around the restructuring and transition of European Railway and transport markets, such as in Romania, Croatia, Serbia, Turkey, Hungary, Poland and Bulgaria. Business development strategies, legal framework adaptations, institutional body (safety, regulation, investigation) implementations and operations resp. marketing concepts have been successfully developed.
goals__remit: With offices in Wiesbaden and Dessau, Germany and international representations in Bucharest, Romania and Ankara, Turkey, Railistics is a professional consulting firm providing a wide range of services related to railway policy, railway economies, intermodal transport, railway vehicles, infrastructure and operations. Railistics’ team has worked together for many years. Their competencies include expertise in the legal framework, rail regulation, the transport market, business planning, engineering and reconstruction, licensing, asset management, technical and financial evaluation of rail transport, railway operation, rolling stock and railway infrastructure
